ComicInfo.Title: Part 6: Sea of Death
ComicInfo.Summary:
Specialist Israel Johnson and Private Edie Cutler have to flee the zombie filled, capsized cruise ship Empress of the Seas, leading the few surviving passengers to the dubious safety of an offshore oil rig. They’re pursued by the ship’s maniacal Captain and Crew, who are intent on killing the would-be heroes. And the zombie whale that capsized the ship is still waiting in the water to devour whoever wins the final fight to the death in the conclusion to the prequel comic series set in the world of Syfy’s hit zombie series Z Nation, produced by The Asylum created by Karl Schaefer and Craig Engler.
